column2: publisher=London: Time and Tide Publishing Co.

column1: '''''Time and Tide'' (3 December 1955)''' is an issue of the British magazine ''[[Wikipedia:Time and Tide (magazine)
column2: Time and Tide]]''. Included is the first publication of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem "[[Imram]]" (page 1561).<ref>{{webcite

column1: The issue also contains reviews of Elizabeth Jenning's ''[[Letter to Elizabeth Jennings
column2: A Way of Looking]]'' and [[W.H. Auden]]'s ''[[List of books in Tolkien's library#The Shield of Achilles
